com.articulate.sigma

Class Vampire

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.articulate.sigma.InferenceEngine
      • com.articulate.sigma.Vampire

  • public class Vampire
extends InferenceEngine
    Class for invoking the KIF version of Vampire from Java. Vampire takes XML input and returns XML output. Input forms are either KIF formula or KIF formula. Results of queries have the following form: KIF formula KIF formula Note that if the result of a query is not a variable binding, then the element will be omitted.
    Since:
    14/08/2003, Acapulco

      • getFactory

        public static InferenceEngine.EngineFactory getFactory()

      • getNewInstance

        public static Vampire getNewInstance(java.lang.String kbFileName)
        This static factory method returns a new Vampire instance.
        Parameters:
        kbFileName - The complete (absolute) pathname of the KB file that will be used to populate the inference engine instance with assertions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - should not normally be thrown unless either Vampire executable or database file name are incorrect

        Parameters:

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Terminate this instance of Vampire. Warning:After calling this function no further assertions or queries can be done.
        Overrides:
        terminate in class InferenceEngine
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - should not normally be thrown

      • submitQuery

        public java.lang.String submitQuery(java.lang.String formula,
                                    int timeLimit,
                                    int bindingsLimit)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Submit a query.
        Specified by:
        submitQuery in class InferenceEngine
        Parameters:
        formula - query in the KIF syntax
        timeLimit - time limit for answering the query (in seconds)
        bindingsLimit - limit on the number of bindings
        Returns:
        answer to the query (in the XML syntax)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - should not normally be thrown

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        A simple test. Works as follows:
        1. start Vampire;
        2. make an assertion;
        3. submit a query;
        4. terminate Vampire.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
